thread.title: Oil & Gas Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ultrapar Participacoes, Valero Energy, Valvoline, and World Fuel Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Oil & Gas Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ultrapar Participacoes, Valero Energy, Valvoline, and World Fuel Services
text:
NEW YORK, April 25, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on UGP, VLO, VVV, and INT which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . WallStEquities.com navigates the Oil and Gas Refining and Marketing space, which is often referred to as the downstream sector of the overall Oil and Gas industry. Companies in this space are engaged in the refining of crude oil and purifying of raw natural gas as well as the marketing and distribution of their refined products. In this morning's lineup are these four stocks: Ultrapar Participacoes S.A. (NYSE: UGP), Valero Energy Corp. (NYSE: VLO), Valvoline Inc. (NYSE: VVV), and World Fuel Services Corp. (NYSE: INT). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Ultrapar Participacoes
Sao Paulo, Brazil headquartered Ultrapar Participacoes S.A.'s stock finished Tuesday's session 3.68% lower at $17.56. A total volume of 824,759 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 560,030. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 19.05%. Furthermore, shares of Ultrapar Participacoes, which through its subsidiaries, engages in the liquefied petroleum gas distribution, fuel distribution, and related businesses, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 19.72. Get the full research report on UGP for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=UGP
Valero Energy
Shares in San Antonio, Texas headquartered Valero Energy Corp. ended at $108.29, down slightly by 0.89% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 3.27 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 18.71% in the last month, 9.73% in the previous three months, and 62.06% over the past year. The stock is trading 14.03% above its 50-day moving average and 30.15% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Valero Energy, which operates as an independent petroleum refining and ethanol producing company, have an RSI of 74.56.
On April 11 th , 2018, research firm Scotia Howard Weil downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Sector Outperform' to 'Sector Perform'. Gain free access to the research report on VLO at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VLO
Valvoline
Lexington, Kentucky headquartered Valvoline Inc.'s stock ended yesterday's session 1.29% lower at $20.73. A total volume of 2.74 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 1.85 million shares. The Company's shares are trading 8.54% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Valvoline, which manufactures and markets engine and automotive maintenance products and services, have an RSI of 32.06.
On April 18 th , 2018, Valvoline announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of 7.45 cents per share of its common stock. The dividend is payable on June 15 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 01 st , 2018.
On April 19 th , 2018, research firm Longbow downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Buy' to 'Neutral'. Signing up today on Wall St. Equities will give you access to the latest report on VVV at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VVV
World Fuel Services
On Tuesday, shares in Miami, Florida headquartered World Fuel Services Corp. recorded a trading volume of 672,188 shares, which was above their three months average volume of 652,220 shares. The stock finished 1.64% lower at $27.06. The Company's shares have advanced 17.40% in the last month. The stock is trading above its 50-day moving average by 10.01%. Furthermore, shares of the Company, which engages in the distribution of fuel, and related products and services in the aviation, marine, and land transportation industries worldwide, have an RSI of 70.68.
On April 13 th , 2018, World Fuel Services announced plans to release its Q1 2018 results after the market closes on April 26 th , 2018. The management team will host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET that same day to discuss the quarterly results as well as certain forward-looking information. Register now for today's free coverage on INT at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=INT
--
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
